channel.title: PvP Shop
channel.description:
I was making my server when i had an idea of putting in a PvP shop and was wondering how do i add it so you get pvp points Per Kill you get and to make you be able to spend them on items like Rares and stuff in a shop? And how would i make it so pvp Points show up Near where your total level is displayed on a 317 ?
Please help.

item.title: PvP Shop
item.dc:creator: @Cody_The_Coder Cody The Coder
item.description:
@Cody_The_Coder wrote:

317 u kidding me? im having troubles with 508,
in 317 all u need to do is npc handler npc.java and thats it.

Read full topic
